original_text: He lived in the same bad way that the kings of Israel did. He did what the family of Ahab had done. He married a daughter of King Ahab and he became as wicked as King Ahab's family was. He did things that the Lord said were evil.
korean_text: 그가 이스라엘 왕들의 길을 가서 아합의 집과 같이 하였으니 이는 아합의 딸이 그의 아내가 되었음이라 그가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: He lived in the same bad way
that the kings of Israel did
He did what the family of Ahab had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아합의 가문이 했던 것을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: He married a daughter of King Ahab
and he became as wicked as King Ahab's family was
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 아합 왕의 가문이 악했던 것처럼 악해졌습니다

sentences.original_text: He did things that the Lord said were evil
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주께서 악하다고 말씀하신 일들을 행했습니다
